module.name: Fax Configuration
module.description: Adds configurations, options and GUI for inbound faxing
module.changelog: *12.0.7* Dont write blank values Asterisk cant understand *12.0.6* FREEPBX-8159 check for incorrect arguments in fail2mail *12.0.5* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *12.0.4* Tweaks to max res and widths *12.0.3* FREEPBX-7140 Set page max resolution and widths so that all pages are the same sizes *12.0.2* Dont Copy duplicate functions *12.0.1* BMO Module *2.11.0.9* Update license file *2.11.0.8* Fix issues with older Asterisk versions caused by fixing #5816 *2.11.0.7* #5816, Adds ru_RU and ja_JP languages *2.11.0.6* Allow specifying email attachment type(s) on inbound fax. *2.11.0.5* Add support for sending email on outbound fax. *2.11.0.4* #6985 Dont display fax options if they wont work *2.11.0.3* #6917 *2.11.0.2* #6810 *2.11.0.1* #6647, #6556 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.6* re #5906 - workaround for php < 5.2 *2.10.0.5* minor code cleanup *2.10.0.4* assotred bug fixes *2.10.0.3* re #5707 - allow posted values to show on page; minor costmetics towards moving to a proper view *2.10.0.2* #5478 *2.10.0.1* incorrect path to system conversion script *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.5* #5029 *2.9.0.4* #5000 *2.9.0.3* #4886 additional *2.9.0.2* #4886, #4907 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4562, #4326, #4557, #4632, #4651, #4653
